duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist with servicing/maintaining Vendor Managed Inventories
Delivering orders generated by the ASR and/or sales team using company vehicle
Receiving, picking, packaging orders for delivery
Maintaining inventory, including cycle counting at RD office
Develop relationships with key stakeholders at serviced accounts to uncover opportunities or issues

education_certification.credential: BS or BA in Business or related experience is preferred / students working towards degree
